snippet: Add Senator James Inhofe, the conservative Republican from Oklahoma, to a small but growing list of senators who would consider backing an increase in the gasoline tax. Just don’t call it a tax.
abstract: Add Senator James Inhofe, the conservative Republican from Oklahoma, to a small but growing list of senators who would consider backing an increase in the gasoline tax. Just don’t call it a tax.

headline.main: Inhofe Says He Would Consider a Gas Tax Increase
